title: Nocturnal Productivity Plan
description: This routine is designed for night owls who are most productive during the late hours. It emphasizes 60% learning and productivity, 30% exercise, and includes time for personal care and relaxation.
author: Sam

routineItems.title: Wake Up Early
routineItems.description: Start your day early to maximize daylight hours.

routineItems.title: Hydrate and Freshen Up
routineItems.description:
Drink a glass of water.
Brush your teeth and wash your face.

routineItems.title: Exercise
routineItems.description: Engage in physical activity (yoga, running, gym workout).
